titleStmt.title: An exposition of the Creed: or, An explanation of the articles of our Christian faith. Delivered in many afternoone sermons, by that reverend and worthy divine, Master Iohn Smith, late preacher of the Word at Clavering in Essex, and sometime fellow of Saint Iohns Colledge in Oxford. Now published for the benefit and behoofe of all good Christians, together with an exact table of all the chiefest doctrines and vses throughout the whole booke
titleStmt.author: Smith, John, 1563-1616.
Palmer, Anthony, fl. 1632.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by Felix Kyngston, for Robert Allot, and are to bee sold at his shop at the signe of the blacke Beare in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: his shop at the signe of the blacke Beare in Pauls Church-yard
